Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.maze.entities

Class Chap

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.maze.Icon
      • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.maze.entities.Entity
        • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.maze.entities.Chap
  • public class Chap
extends Entity
    Represents Chap who is the hero of the game. Chap can move, interact with entities and is controlled by the player.
